wybug_title: 凤凰网某站sql注射。（请允许俺再无耻一次）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2012-06-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2012-06-08：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2012-06-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2012-06-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2012-07-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2012-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 凤凰网某站sql注射。（请允许俺再无耻一次）嘎嘎，为了提高基数。这个站俺不看了，我看其他的站。 详细说明：  
http://app.ent.ifeng.com/star/pic.php?id=540%E2%80%99Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT * FROM star_news where nid=540’Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT content FROM star_intro WHERE id=540’Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT url FROM star_avatar WHERE id=540’Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT r.to_id,b.name,av.url FROM star_relation r LEFT JOIN star_base b ON r.to_id=b.id LEFT JOIN star_avatar av ON r.to_id=av.id WHERE uid=540’ AND b.online=1 LIMIT 6Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT * FROM star_vote WHERE id=540’Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT p.url,p.width,p.height,p.lay_pic,p.web FROM star_pic p LEFT JOIN star_base b ON p.name=b.name WHERE b.id=540’ AND p.online=1 AND p.width!=0 ORDER BY p.id DESC
   漏洞证明：  
http://app.ent.ifeng.com/star/pic.php?id=540%E2%80%99Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT * FROM star_news where nid=540’Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT content FROM star_intro WHERE id=540’Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT url FROM star_avatar WHERE id=540’Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT r.to_id,b.name,av.url FROM star_relation r LEFT JOIN star_base b ON r.to_id=b.id LEFT JOIN star_avatar av ON r.to_id=av.id WHERE uid=540’ AND b.online=1 LIMIT 6Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT * FROM star_vote WHERE id=540’Query sql failed. SQL:SELECT p.url,p.width,p.height,p.lay_pic,p.web FROM star_pic p LEFT JOIN star_base b ON p.name=b.name WHERE b.id=540’ AND p.online=1 AND p.width!=0 ORDER BY p.id DESC
